about_the_game:
Pulsar: They Listen is a horror-themed co-op multiplayer game where a group of survivors tries to achieve specific objectives in order to escape a large laboratory complex, figure out what happened to the world around them and, hopefully, fix it.

While otherworldly monsters try to hunt them down and kill them all!

Immerse yourself in a unique, sound-driven world where darkness and mystery heighten every sense. With asymmetrical multiplayer and non-linear co-op gameplay, team up with fellow survivors to outwit multiple AI monsters and a main monster player, while completing shared and individual objectives.
